DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the pre-operative levels of sex-hormones can be used to identify the varicocele patients who can expect improvements in their semen parameters following varicocelectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Varicocelectomy: Can Sex-hormones Predict Improvements in Semen Quality?
DOC.criteria: Varicocele (grade 13) and surgery planned for this condition At least 18 years of age Fever within 3 months before the first semen sample Malformations of the urogenital tract Karyotype other than 46, XY or Y micro deletions Endocrine disease Chronic disease Medications which reduce semen quality Epididymitis within 6 months before surgery
